bdi4jade.plan.planbody

Class ParallelActionPlanBody

  • java.lang.Object
    • jade.core.behaviours.Behaviour
      • jade.core.behaviours.CompositeBehaviour
        • jade.core.behaviours.ParallelBehaviour
          • bdi4jade.plan.planbody.ParallelActionPlanBody
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GoalListener, PlanBody, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener

    public class ParallelActionPlanBody
extends jade.core.behaviours.ParallelBehaviour
implements PlanBody
    This allows a plan body to inherit from both AbstractPlanBody and ParallelBehaviour.
    Author:
    Ingrid Nunes
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • dispatchGoal

        public void dispatchGoal(Goal goal)
        Description copied from interface: PlanBody
        Dispatches a goal to be achieved. It is added as a top level agent goal, that is, the dispatched goal is independent of the goal that this plan body is trying to achieve.
        Specified by:
        dispatchGoal in interface PlanBody
        Parameters:
        goal - the goal to be dispatched.

        public void dispatchProtectedSubgoalAndListen(Goal subgoal)
        Description copied from interface: PlanBody

      • dispatchSubgoal

        public void dispatchSubgoal(Goal subgoal)
        Description copied from interface: PlanBody
        Dispatches a subgoal to be achieved. Dispatched subgoals are goals of an agent as long as the plan body that dispatched it is being executed.
        Specified by:
        dispatchSubgoal in interface PlanBody
        Parameters:
        subgoal - the subgoal to be dispatched.

      • getGoalEvent

        public GoalEvent getGoalEvent()
        Description copied from interface: PlanBody
        Returns a goal event from the queue. If the queue is empty, the behavior associated with this plan instance is blocked.
        Specified by:
        getGoalEvent in interface PlanBody
        Returns:
        the goal event or null if the queue is empty.

      • getGoalEvent

        public GoalEvent getGoalEvent(boolean block)
        Description copied from interface: PlanBody
        Returns a goal event from the queue. If the queue is empty, the behavior associated with this plan instance is going to be blocked if the parameter passed to this method is true.
        Specified by:
        getGoalEvent in interface PlanBody
        Parameters:
        block - true if the behavior must be blocked if the queue is empty.
        Returns:
        the goal event or null if the queue is empty.

      • getGoalEvent

        public GoalEvent getGoalEvent(long ms)
        Description copied from interface: PlanBody
        Returns a goal event from the queue. If the queue is empty, the behavior associated with this plan instance is going to be blocked for the specified milliseconds.
        Specified by:
        getGoalEvent in interface PlanBody
        Parameters:
        ms - the maximum amount of time that the behavior must be blocked.
        Returns:
        the goal event or null if the queue is empty.

      • init

        public void init(Plan plan,
        Intention intention)
          throws PlanInstantiationException
        Description copied from interface: PlanBody
        Initializes this plan body. It associates this plan body with a plan definition (Plan) and an Intention. If this plan body has already been initialized, this method throws a PlanInstantiationException.
        Specified by:
        init in interface PlanBody
        Parameters:
        plan - the plan associated this this plan body.
        intention - the intention that this plan instance have to achieve.
        Throws:
        PlanInstantiationException - if this plan body has already been initialized.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Description copied from interface: PlanBody
        Stops the plan body, a Behaviour, associated with this plan. If the body implements the DisposablePlanBody, it invokes the method to about the plan body, so it can perform finalizations.
        Specified by:
        stop in interface PlanBody
